definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上將爐渣從爐子裏耙出來。

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上將出現浮動酒店。

sentences.english: Thanks to unknown military merits young Kim was just promoted to four-star general.
sentences.chinese: 仗着無人知曉的軍功，小金剛剛被晉升爲四星上將。

sentences.english: General Anatol Gogal: On the contrary, Admiral. Where would Russian research be without it?
sentences.chinese: 相反地，上將，沒有了它俄國到那兒去研究呢？

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards admiral harwood learnt that the ship was weighing anchor.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後不久，哈伍德海軍上將獲悉“施佩”號在起錨了。

sentences.english: The first female admiral in the U.S. navy.
sentences.chinese: 美國海軍第一個女上將。

sentences.english: We rushed her to the hospital where she underwent surgery and now she is in a stable condition.
sentences.chinese: 我們馬上將她送到醫院做手術，現在她情況穩定。

sentences.english: The event will be back to round things through to the king of jin.
sentences.chinese: 事後楊素回到府上將事情經過告訴給了晉王。

sentences.english: But, straightaway, I would lift it on to my head.
Paper and board . characteristics of drawing paper.
sentences.chinese: 在白色繪圖紙上將編稿曬成藍圖。

sentences.english: If you plan to cruise, how many crew may be aboard?
sentences.chinese: 如果你計劃巡航，船上將有多少位水手？

sentences.english: Each player removes two cards in his or her hand from the game.
sentences.chinese: 每個玩家從手上將兩張牌移出遊戲。

sentences.english: A new bridge will be built over the river.
Like Admiral Mullen, Mr. Crowley called on China to act.
sentences.chinese: 同穆倫上將一樣，克勞利也呼籲中國行動起來。

sentences.english: I took it out on a Friday evening.
sentences.chinese: 我在星期五晚上將他拿出來了。

sentences.english: We will provide flip-chart paper and magic markers.
sentences.chinese: 課上將提供演示用活頁紙和魔術筆。

definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to found a state/to open a closed country
